title: Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list
body:
In the devnet test environment, when I use the genesis node to generate blocks, the following error is reported after a period of time

```
time="2023-05-02 22:09:22" level=error msg="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:09:22" level=error msg="Failed to update assignments" error="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:09:34" level=error msg="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:09:34" level=error msg="Failed to update assignments" error="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:09:46" level=error msg="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:09:46" level=error msg="Failed to update assignments" error="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:09:58" level=error msg="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:09:58" level=error msg="Failed to update assignments" error="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:10:10" level=error msg="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:10:10" level=error msg="Failed to update assignments" error="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:10:22" level=error msg="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:10:22" level=error msg="Failed to update assignments" error="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:10:34" level=error msg="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:10:34" level=error msg="Failed to update assignments" error="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:10:46" level=error msg="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:10:46" level=error msg="Failed to update assignments" error="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:10:58" level=error msg="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator
time="2023-05-02 22:10:58" level=error msg="Failed to update assignments" error="rpc error: code = Internal desc = Could not compute committee assignments: could not check proposer at slot 768: could not update committee cache: empty active indices list" prefix=validator

```

What is happening here is that all your validators have been penalized due to being offline for so long and have been exited from the chain. So now there are no validators to shuffle into different committees. Closing this issue as it is a general feature of how the beacon chain works rather than anything specific to prysm
